title: O rAjarAjEshvari
sahitya:
O rAjarAjEshvari nA neramencaka nannu brOvu 
nIrajAsanAdi vinuta pAda shAradAbhakta varadA


anupallavi

  mArajanaka sundari akari kumara janani nityakalyANi 
mAraharuni rANi manjuLavENi umA rakSimpa samayamammA


caraNam 1    mOdadAyaki nIvaniyenci nI pAdamu jUDa AsakoniyuNTi
nI dayacE nEDugaNTi nannAdarinca manci taruNamaNTi
    caraNam 2    sandEhamumAni bhakti bUni nIyandE manasu nilipina dAsula
munduga brOtuvani vininityAnandI sharaNaNti sadAshivAnandini
